title: Batch transcribe multiple files
description: Easily transcribe as many files as you want with a single click.

title: Multiple formats
description: Export transcriptions in your preferred format including SRT, VTT, TXT, HTML and many more

title: Transcribe audio / video
description: Supports audio and video formats like MP4, MKV, MP3, WAV (there's more)

title: Transcribe microphone / speakers
description: Effortlessly convert spoken words to text directly from your microphone or speakers.

title: Optimized for GPU
description: Vibe is optimized to run on Nvidia/AMD/Apple GPUs!

title: Ultimate privacy
description: Enjoy fully offline transcription, ensuring no data ever leaves your device.

title: Total Freedom
description: Customize models effortlessly in settings for a tailored experience.
